statements: UPDATE configuration_data SET config_value='new_value' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE configuration_data SET app_name='App 1', config_type='Type A', config_value='Value A', last_updated=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id=1;
UPDATE configuration_data SET config_value='Value B', last_updated=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE app_name='App 2' AND config_type='Type B';

UPDATE app_configuration SET version = 2 WHERE app_name = 'my_app' AND environment = 'production';

UPDATE ServerConfigurations SET server_ip = '192.168.1.100', server_status = true WHERE server_name = 'MyServer';
UPDATE AppSettings SET setting_value = 'enabled' WHERE app_id = 123 AND setting_key = 'auto_refresh';
